headline: Pittsburgh bridge collapses, drops city bus into ravine
author: Associated Press
sentences:
By GENE PUSKAR and MARK SCOLFORO
PITTSBURGH (AP) â€” A 50-year-old bridge collapsed in Pittsburgh early Friday, requiring rescuers to rappel down a ravine and form a human chain to reach a few occupants of a municipal bus that plummeted along with the span.
